definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle

sentences.english: A butcher offers pork at a market in Shenyang, China.
sentences.chinese: 瀋陽一位肉販在市場賣豬肉。

sentences.english: On Friday morning Jack went and hired himself to a butcher.
sentences.chinese: 星期五早上，傑克去給一位肉販幹活。

sentences.english: When evening came the butcher gave him a nice leg of mutton for his services.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚時分，肉販送他一隻很好的羊腿作爲酬勞。
